owner_summaries.key_concerns: High number of reconciliation exceptions and entity-level TB imbalances
Accruals exceptions are within acceptable limits

residual_risks.description: Entity-level trial balance not zeroed, indicating potential misstatements
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Implement stricter review processes for trial balance adjustments

residual_risks.description: High number of bank and AP reconciliation exceptions
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Increase frequency of reconciliation reviews and implement automated exception tracking
